comments.author: lucabol
comments.message:
The event is in LA: http://microsoftpdc.com/
They usually post some of the sessions on the web site for free viewing. I don't know how the pick which ones. Also they might sell the dvd with all the sessions (not sure).

comments.author: Timothy Bussmann
comments.message: Do you have a link to a video of your presentation?  I'd like to watch it but couldn't find a video on the PDC website.

comments.author: lucabol
comments.message: They post them sometimes after the event (I think). Maybe in the upcoming days ...

comments.author: John Cole
comments.message: I wish I could be there, but it's hard to get away during the school year.  I look forward to seeing the videos.
